docs.title: 1. To get help on the main function use the following command:
docs.text:
$ spinview --help

╭─ Options ────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --install-comple…       Install           │
│                         completion for    │
│                         the current       │
│                         shell.            │
│ --show-completion       Show completion   │
│                         for the current   │
│                         shell, to copy it │
│                         or customize the  │
│                         installation.     │
│ --help                  Show this message │
│                         and exit.         │
╰───────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─ Commands ───────────────────────────────────╮
│ check-database                            │
│ initial-database                          │
│ start                                     │
╰───────────────────────────────────────────────╯

docs.title: 1. Help function of check-database, the ....... in the content is used for replace the real help content.
docs.text:
$  spinview check-database --help


 Usage: spinview check-database
            [OPTIONS]
╭─ Options ────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --db-name        📁database        .......│
│                  name              .......│
│ --table-name     📙database        .......│
│                  table name        .......│
│ --help                             .......│
╰───────────────────────────────────────────────╯

docs.title: 2. Help function of initial-database.
docs.text:
$  spinview initial-database --help


 Usage: spinview initial-database
            [OPTIONS]

╭─ Options ────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --help       Show this message and exit.  │
╰──────────────────────────────────────────────╯

docs.title: Internal beta test
docs.text:
It is an honour for us to invite Filipp, Wanjian, Manuel, Zhenzhu, Zhuanglin, Qingda, Zhenyang, Guoqiang, Zhiwei, Ivan to join our internal beta test.

Thank you all in advance for your time and effort to help us improve SpinView before it is released.

Here we provide step-by-step instructions for installing guide SpinView (internal-beta version).

docs.title: 1. Installing SpinView with conda virtual environment.
docs.text:
• To install miniconda please follow the instructions here.

  • To install Anaconda please follow the instructions here.

You can choose one of the above two options to install conda.

docs.title: 2. Create a new conda environment for SpinView using the following command:
docs.text:
$ conda create -n spinview python=3.9

Proceed ([y]/n)?     y
---> 100%
Successfully created conda environment for SpinView

docs.title: 3. Go to the path that have spinview-1.0.0-py3-none-any.whl file and install SpinView spinview-1.0.0-py3-none-any.whl file using the following command:
docs.text:
$ pip install ./spinview-1.0.0-py3-none-any.whl
---> 100%
Successfully installed spinview

Note that user in China Mainland may need to add a pip source to make sure you can easily download all packages. (add -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple)

$ pip install ./spinview-1.0.0-py3-none-any.whl  -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple
---> 100%
Successfully installed spinview

docs.title: 4. launch SpinView in simulation folder (sub-folder in the demo) under auto mode using the following command, remember you need to use the conda environment that you created in step 2:
docs.text:
$ conda activate spinview

$ spinview start
Note: it will be a little bit slow from cold start, please wait for a while.

docs.title: 5. You can followed the demo in features or try features with your own data:
docs.text:
Download the demo:

Test.zip

Note:

  1. In UppASD demo, one trajectory is includes for 20 frames.

  2. In Mumax3 demo, 10 snapshots are included for one trajectory.

  3. In Spirit demo, 2 big snapshots(606060), one is hopfion and another is skyrmion tube.

  4. In Vampire demo, one trajectory with kagome lattice is include, in this case, rectangle mesh will not work, only trianglazation is needed for isosurface rendering.

Know problem:

  1. In macos the local view windows can not close or will leave a python icon stay in your docker, see here: https://github.com/pyvista/pyvista/issues/1096, but it will not affect the main window, and the local view mode works properly when open it again. Our current suggestion is just leave the ghost windows there after close the local view windows and go back to the main window. (This problem will not happend in windows system.)

$ spinview start

Note that denoise is not limit to small 2D data, here we use 2D system as a demo is just because the performance limit of Github pages. You can find more complex demo in our paper.

docs.title: original data:
docs.text: In this demo, thermal fluctuation make the texture can not be seen or understand clearly.

docs.title: Denoise using FFT filter:
docs.text:
This feature is apply a rectanglar low pass filter to the data (after FFT). Then apply revised FFT to get orginal data back.

But it is worthy to note that, distortions of denoising is always exist when using FFT, here I give a extreme case where the data is distorted a lot.:

docs.title: Denoise using Butterworth filter:
docs.text: This feature is first transfer the data into squance of 1D data (can be viewed as signal) then apply Butterworth filter to each 1D data. Then transfer the data back to orignal vector field data. Note that, this feature may not good as FFT low pass filter, may improve in the future.

docs.title: 1. Installing SpinView with conda virtual environment.
docs.text:
• To install miniconda please follow the instructions here.

  • To install Anaconda please follow the instructions here.

docs.title: 2. Create a new conda environment for SpinView using the following command:
docs.text:
$ conda create -n spinview python=3.9
$ conda create -n spinview python=3.9

Proceed ([y]/n)?     y
---> 100%
Successfully created conda environment for SpinView

docs.title: 3. Install SpinView using the following command:
docs.text:
$ conda activate spinview
$ pip install spinview
---> 100%
Successfully installed spinview

Note that user in China mainland may need to add a pip source to make sure you can easily download all packages. (add -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple)

$ pip install spinview  -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple
---> 100%
Successfully installed spinview

docs.title: 4. launch SpinView in simulation folder under auto mode using the following command:
docs.text:
$ spinview start

Note: it will be a little bit slow from cold start, please wait for a while.

Note: it will be a little bit slow from cold start, please wait for a while.

Note:

  1. When using Client(VTKjs) mode, manually reload the webpage is needed.
  2. Suggest to use local view instead of increase the quality of server mode.

docs.title: 1. Installing directly with pip.
docs.text:
$ pip install spinview
---> 100%
Successfully installed spinview

docs.title: Activate glyph sphere:
docs.text:
You can overlap all objects in the Objects drawer.

Here we show the process of overlapping sphere and arrow glyphs with transparent T mesh step by step.

Firstly, let us add the sphere glyph to the scene.

docs.title: Overlap with glyph arrow:
docs.text:
Then, we overlap the arrow glyph to the scene.

Let's change a little bit the starting point of the arrow.

docs.title: Overlap with T mesh:
docs.text: Prefect, let us add the T mesh to the scene and change the opacity of the T mesh with the Theta component.

docs.title: 6. Using User's define object:
docs.text:
In the Objects drawer, click the User's button (make sure that the global Glyphs button is activate when using any glyph)

Here we first creat the object in the Binder and save it with the name own_glyph.ply

then replace it with the same name file the own_glyph folder which is in installation folder of SpinView, then we can use it in SpinView.

The it can be activated in the SpinView UI:

docs.title: 7. Using Delaunay triangulation mesh:
docs.text: In the Objects drawer, click the T mesh button, keep in mind, this operation is very time consuming, please be patient. :-)
